issue.title: [C++] Expose a ReadValuesSpaced method that accepts a validity bitmap.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8490](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8490). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current logic for determining spacing internally converts def levels for variable sized lists.  This logic won't work fixed size lists.
